label: BatchTriggerControl
description: Collectively set URL Map's rebuild triggers from the Listing Screen.
author: Alfasado Inc.

action_urlmapping_remove_trigger.name: action_urlmapping_remove_trigger
action_urlmapping_remove_trigger.label: Delete Model's Triggers
action_urlmapping_remove_trigger.hint: Enter the model names separated by commas.

action_urlmapping_add_trigger.name: action_urlmapping_add_trigger
action_urlmapping_add_trigger.label: Add Model's Triggers
action_urlmapping_add_trigger.hint: Enter the model names separated by commas.
